document.full_text: in a season of unprecedented tension in scottish soccer, the threshold of tolerance looks to have finally been crossed after the police intercepted nail bombs sent to celtic manager neil lennon.
document.title: with mail bombs, old firm rivalry crosses the line
lines_and_colors: in a season of unprecedented tension in scottish soccer, the threshold of tolerance looks to have finally been crossed after the police intercepted nail bombs sent to celtic manager neil lennon.
